title: Graphic Design
description: Professional graphic design resources and inspiration. Discover tools, templates, and inspiration for logo design, branding, print design, and visual communication. Explore galleries showcasing the work of talented graphic designers worldwide.

resources.title: InspirationGrid
resources.description: Curated daily dose of creative inspiration including graphic design, architecture, photography, and art from around the world.

resources.title: Women of Graphic Design
resources.description: A project focused on exhibiting the contributions of women in graphic design and exploring issues of gender-equality in education provided by design institutions.
